# Welcome! {.unnumbered}

<!-- &#x1F393; -->
<!-- `r rmarkdown::metadata$description` -->

I'm Uli and this is an HTML preview of my thesis entitled _"Intelligent Assistance for Expert-Driven Subpopulation Discovery in High-Dimensional Time-Stamped Medical Data"_. 

I will hopefully submit the final manuscript on March 25, 2021.

The current writing progress per chapter is shown below. 

You can download the [PDF version](https://github.com/unmnn/thesis/blob/master/_book/thesis.pdf) from the GitHub repository.
